title: Opportunity
ability_text: An opportunity arises. Starting with the highest, each player with 10 or more Strength may choose to place this card in front of them for +10 Strength. The player that does is now known as a Warrior. If no player chooses to do this, then place front of all players for a +10 Magic bonus to all players with 10 or more Magic, who each gain the title of Wizard.
